data.description: Interface to POSIX RT message queues
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
AFAIK there is no perl module to interface with POSIX message
    queues (mq_* function family). The name POSIX::RT::MQ is chosen to
    leave POSIX::RT::* namespace for other POSIX RealTime extension
    modules. (say, AIO ?).
